##################




!NEW - USB Flash Drive/Removable Disk/PenDrive Support! For ex. you can install it on Windows XP copy to USB Flash Drive & using it (automatic "USB Mode") on another computer even with Windows 7 (unsupported plugins will be changed automatically)!
You can also run Total CMA Pack without administrator rights - "USB Mode" will start automatically :)

!NEW install script! If You want for example Dutch language choose Dutch on install start, then You will get Dutch menu and all plugins configured to Dutch language but only if available, if not plugins will be in English as default!




Total CMA Pack
Version 0.51
13/03/2010

This is Total CMA Pack (with 47 Languages). Discover new feature of Total Commander, many new options & plugins, use "F3" on avi file for preview, "F4" for edit txt file, or "Ctrl+Page Down" for see inside avi, many other file extension!
Check & test other feature of this pimped-up software & find new opportunity :)

Some Extensions & Features:
Video viewer (integrated WMP by Mmedia or SMViewer): avi (F3 or "Ctrl+Page Down"), mpg, mpeg, dat, vob, mp4, 3gp, rmvb, ogm, wmv, asf, asx, mkv, mov, ts, qt, divx, flv & other! (F3)
Music lister: mp3, ape, ogg, mpc, wma, wav, aac, ac3, flac, midi, m3u, pls & other! (F3)
Graphic viewer: jpg, jpeg, bmp, gif, ico, icl & other! (F3)
CD/DVD image viewer: iso, bin, img, nrg, mdf ("Ctrl+Page Down")
IE viewer: htm, html, url & other! (F3)
Office: doc, xls (F3)
Office 2007: docx, pptx, xlsx, ppsx (F3 or "Ctrl+Page Down")
Open Office: all formats (F3 or "Ctrl+Page Down")
Other: eml, ini, lnk, nfo, pdf, reg, swf, torrent (F3), cab, chm, dbx, exe, mht, msi (F3 or "Ctrl+Page Down")
Create: avi, cab, chm, gif, icl (F9)
Archive: zip, rar, ace, cab, bz2 & other! (F9)
Internal: Winamp, RSS, FTP
Linux & NTFS Partition Viewer
Recovery lost or corupted files FDD/HDD/CD/DVD/USB Flash Drive/Removable Disk/PenDrive
View Process, Drivers, StartUp, Services & other!
Adwanced: UnInstall, Clipboard, Plugin Manager, Control Panel, Device Manager, Network & others!
Secure or Erase files
Text Editor
& Many Many Others! :)

F3 - View, some may edit!
F9 - Pack or Create
"Ctrl+Page Down" - Source, some may edit by Resource Hacker!
Video & music plugins may required additional codecs!

Software fully support Win 2000/XP/2003/Vista/2008/7, 32bit(x82) & 64bit(x64) :)

New Shortcuts:
F1 - Compare contents
F2 - Find files
F8 - Synchronize directories
F9 - Pack files
F10 - Multi-Rename tool
F11 - Split file
F12 - Show file content
Shift+5 - Window separator at 50%
Shift+C - Copy name(s) to clipboard
Shift+L - Branch view
Shift+N - Turn long names on and off
Shift+V - Copy path name(s) to clipboard


* - Win Vista/7: plugin not supported

Incompatible plugins will be skipped automatically!



Because i get information that some antivirus inform that plugin wdx_eml.wdx have virus i decide to upload new version of Total CMA Pack before new version of Total Commander. I re-scan this plugin one more time by nod32, avg, mcafee & i didn't found anything, i'm pretty sure that this is only a fake warning but i decided to change this plugin to better one - TextSearch just in case.

You need to remember that i'm NOT author of this plugins i only gather all in one project & always before upload a new version like 0.50 in 2009-09-20 i check project in all available antivirus scan.


Project 0.51 scanned 2010.03.11 by nod32, avg, mcafee, kaspersky, k7antivirus, gdata, f-secure, avast & no virus found if you get information that there is a virus this will be a fake warning....
This is private project so if you don't like it don't comment or download, but if you know what is this or want test alternative version of Total Commander feel free to try it on your computer :)

This software is only for tests if you don't have license for this software please don't download this, first buy a license & support the authors!
